name: God is Dead Visual Novel
description:
God is Dead is a mystery drama visual novel about a young lady who wins a trip to a resort on a mysterious island. The game comprises of first person narration with glimpses of the past through various characters. The game is loosely inspired by Nietzsche’s famous formulation.

The Story follows a group of candidates who are invited to play a murder mystery game. But the game slowly unravels and the protagonist discovers the hotel’s façade and it’s hidden secrets. She soon finds herself wrapped up in something larger than life… and death.

Art / Story / Scripting
